Class BoardController

java.lang.Object
com.example.obstaclecourse.Controllers.BoardController
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class BoardController extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
Controller class managing the game board and player actions.

  • Method Details

    • addPlayers

      public ArrayList<com.example.obstaclecourse.Models.Player> addPlayers()
      Retrieves the number of players and their names from the console, creating player objects and adding them to the player list. Prompts the user to enter a valid number of players if the input is less than 2. Prints a welcome message on the console, including the names of the players.
      Returns:
      The list of created players

    • setScoreBoardController

      public void setScoreBoardController(ScoreBoardController controller)
      Sets the scoreboard controller.
      Parameters:
      controller - The scoreboard controller to be set

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Handles property change events triggered by the game model. Updates the UI based on changes in the game state.
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - The property change event.

    • initializePlayers

      public ArrayList<javafx.scene.image.ImageView> initializePlayers()
      Adds player views to the game board. Initializes and sets up player controllers for each player.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList containing ImageViews for each player.
